revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ilex Forest |image = [[File:Ilex Forest.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Ilex Forest. |tokens = 4,000 |location = On route 34. }} '''Ilex Forest''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 82,200 |- | Boss || 300,000 |- | Celebi || 600,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Caterpie * Metapod * Weedle * Kakuna * Zubat * Oddish * Paras * Hoothoot * Celebi (boss) *Requires being Johto Champion
